messages.message: This is so frustrating, i bought a laptop and it's not working properly. I want to return it and get my money back. I'm so disappointed
I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please provide me with the order number and the reason for the return?

I don't have the order number with me right now, but I can provide you with the serial number of the laptop. The reason for the return is that the laptop is not turning on and the screen is flickering. Also i can't even log in!
